name: false-surrender
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.
